author: Jillian Kestler-D'Amours
title: Life slowly resumes in Ottawa under heavy police presence
description: Shops are reopening in centre of Canada’s capital after weeks-long occupation by anti-government protesters dispersed.
content: Ottawa, Canada  After weeks of blaring truck horns and boisterous crowds denouncing coronavirus measures and Prime Minister Justin Trudeaus government, the streets in the heart of Canadas capital hav… [+5369 chars]
